div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Important Information Regarding Mandated School Closure

Things have changed rapidly over the weekend with regard to the Governor’s ordered school closure of all public and private schools in the State. We understand that we may be ordered to stay closed longer than the 2 weeks previously planned.

p.strong: So here’s what you need to know:

ul.li: There will be NO TEACHERS at school during this time off.

The Governor has asked that there be an administrator to be present at school during school hours. Mr. Miller will be at school every day from 8 a.m. to 3 p.m. Please call if you have questions or need anything.

Meals will be available to students during the closure through grab and go locations and/or by delivery. You will need to contact the school by 9 am on Tuesday (tomorrow) if you would like your child to have meals every day during this shut-down time. This way we can plan a count for everyday. If you change your mind later, you may still call. You may call or email the office, or text Mrs. Jukes (see contact information below). Meals will consist of lunch and a snack.
Meal grab and go sites and pick-up times are as follows:
In front of our school building - 10:45 - 11:15 am
Students living in Opdyke will have meals delivered.
Belle Rive Baptist Church - 12:00-12:30 am
If you cannot pick up at any of these sites, please let us know and we will arrange for delivery
Teachers will have learning packets for all students which will contain review and enrichment activities. There will also be online activities available.
If your child needs a Chromebook, please contact Mrs. Jukes and we will arrange to get a device to you. If you have questions about any of the activities, please email your child’s teacher.

div.p: What information do we need from you:

ul.li: Each teacher MUST have a contact email for each student. If you have more than one child in school or your child has more than one teacher, you may add all of those teachers’ email addresses to the “To:” line.
If you need help with anything, including questions, concerns, advice, etc., please contact us. All contact information is below.

div.p: It seems information from the State changes frequently. We will do our very best to keep you informed of the changes through SchoolMessenger, Facebook, and email. As always, please call if you have any questions. This is a challenging time for all of you and for all of us at OBR and throughout the State of Illinois. We are here to help you. Please do not hesitate to reach out. We will do our best to help you in any way that we can.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-OiUrBf jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Opdyke-Belle Rive Community Consolidated School District 5
19380 East Fourth Street | P.O. Box 189 | Opdyke, IL 62872 | Phone: 618.756.2492
